title: Mayura-Inspired Emerald & Diamond Haaram - The "Prakriti Sobha" Collection
features: This exquisite Haaram features a central pendant with two exquisitely crafted peacocks (Mayura) adorned with pave-set polki diamonds and captivating Zambian Emeralds for their eyes. The pendant is further embellished with a floral motif set with polki diamonds. Delicate emerald bead tassels with pearl accents hang elegantly, adding movement and a touch of contemporary flair. The chain is a double strand consisting of alternating natural emerald and pearl beads, intricately strung for a regal yet modern look. This piece showcases a harmonious blend of traditional temple jewelry motifs and contemporary design.
colors: and the subtle sparkle of polki diamonds create a vibrant and luxurious color palette.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. A striking piece for a Seemantham or Half-Saree function (Langa Voni).
description: This haaram is a modern heirloom, a timeless piece that represents the beauty of Indian craftsmanship. The natural emeralds are carefully selected for their vibrant color and clarity. The Hyderabadi polish adds a rich luster, while the intricate design showcases the skill of our master artisans. The symbolic significance of the peacock (beauty, grace, and love) makes it a cherished gift or a meaningful addition to your jewelry collection.
